dict.string: Camera access is required to record videos and scan documents for your secure vault.
Microphone access is required to record audio with your videos and voice memos.
Photo library access is required to upload images and documents to your secure vault.
Location access is used for access logging and geofencing security features.
Contacts access is required to share vaults with your friends and family via iMessage.
Calendar access is required to schedule automated security reviews for your vaults.
Reminders access is required to set up security review notifications.
Speech recognition is required to transcribe audio documents and voice memos for intelligence analysis.
